#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,m,a;
    cin>>n>>m>>a;
    if(m>n){
        int t=m;
        m=n;
        n=t;
    }
    
    int sum=1,top=0;
    if (n > a){
    top = int(ceil(n * 1.0 / a));
    sum = top;
    }
 
if (m > a){
    sum += top * (int(ceil((m * 1.0 - a) / a)));
}
cout<<sum<<endl;
 
}
